positions.title: Distributor

positions.description:
Michael White Designs is a freelance graphic and web design studio based out of Tucson, Arizona, serving clients nationwide. We specialize in clean, effective, standards-based web design as well as superior designs for print.

As a freelance graphic designer I have worked on many projects. Some of my most recent include a logo design for a non-profit organization in New York, a website for a motorcycle suspension company and most recently, club cards and posters for Maloney's Tavern in Tucson.

Specialties: Photo retouching using Adobe Photoshop, graphic design, web design
positions.title: Owner

positions.description: As the lead web developer I was in charge of developing and implementing custom designed sites, from our art department, into Joomla CMS templates or hard coded HTML and CSS sites. My focus was on SEO practices and web standards. Other responsibilities were debugging, maintaining client web sites, creating and optimizing web graphics, building Flash graphics, e-mail campaigns and recommending the best technologies to implement based on client needs.
positions.title: Web Developer

positions.description: As the only graphic designer and web designer I was responsible for designing and managing the production of product data sheets, company identity materials and convention booth graphics. As-well-as maintaining and updating parent and sister company web sites, using PHP and Wordpress.
positions.title: Web Designer/ Graphic Designer

positions.description: As an Image specialist I was responsible for manipulating raw photos. This included digital retouching, composing several photos into one shot, color correcting photos to match printed catalogs to actual products as closely as possible using Photoshop. I also did page layout using Quark Express.
positions.title: Image Specialist
